long_description: Head to the crags or clear your back forty in the men's stretchy, rugged Kuhl Raid soft-shell pants with a 30 in. inseam. You'll love the 6 zippered pockets that keep your gear from getting lost. Nylon/spandex technical soft-shell fabric features 4-way stretch, excellent abrasion resistance, and a durable water repellent finish. Reverse-coil zippers repel snow and rain. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Classic jeans styling offers 6 zippered pockets: 2 hand, 2 rear, 1 side 3D and 1 side drop-in. Kuhl Raid 30 in. inseam pants for men are designed to be worn over a base layer or on their own.
short_description: Head to the crags or clear your back forty in the men's stretchy, rugged Kuhl Raid soft-shell pants with a 30 in. inseam. You'll love the 6 zippered pockets that keep your gear from getting lost.
